attributes.action: HONOUR MR MARTIN MCNALLY, MD FRCSEd, FRCS(Orth)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to nominate for an award, Mr McNally for his work in the treatment of bone disease. Mr McNally heads the Osteomyelitis clinic at the Nuffield Orthopaedic Centre, Windmill Road, Headington, Oxford, OX3 7LD. Due to his reputation, Mr McNally is receiving referrals from all over the UK. He is treating not only osteomyelitis, but leg lenghtening, deformity correction, bone infection to both adults and children who have either been born with limb defects or injured in accidents. He is giving hope to people who would otherwise face a lifetime of crippling disability. Now is the opportunity for all those who have benefited to show their appreciation to Mr McNally and the team that he heads.
